hosting._headers_note: WARNING: Do NOT add Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy (COOP) or Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy (COEP) headers. COOP breaks Firebase Auth signInWithPopup because Google's auth page sets its own strict COOP, severing the popup-to-opener connection. COEP breaks CDN resources, iframes, and images. The browser default (unsafe-none) is correct for this app.
